com.kodelog.validation.utility
Class ValidationHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.kodelog.validation.utility.ValidationHelper

public final class ValidationHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Validation class used for validation. The class is an implementation of the famous Builder Pattern. In order to validate a param with a certain value. Example-
ValidationHelper.validateValue(new Integer(3)).against(1) .usingValidator(ValidationHelper.isNotNull()) .and(ValidationHelper.isEqual(), true)
This code validates if (new Integer(3)) is equal to 3.

Author:
73ddy
